summary:
Capitalism is an economic system where people privately own businesses and land. It's all about making a profit! In capitalism, businesses compete with each other, and prices are decided by the market. This system encourages people to work hard, be creative, and spend money on what they want.

It started in Europe a long time ago, during the Industrial Revolution. Now, most countries have a mix of capitalism and government control. Sometimes, there are ups and downs in the economy, but capitalism keeps growing and changing.
title: Capitalism
